Entries.AbbyWin: pause 100/jump Abigail/faceDirection Vincent 3/pause 800/move Abigail 0 -1 0/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Lewis "Here's your prize, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}}. Enjoy!"/pause 500/move Abigail 0 -1 0/playSound coin/pause 400/move Abigail 0 2 0/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Egg Festival. Thanks for coming, everyone!"/pause 1000/viewport move 1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Maru_spouse: I'm just catching up with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}. Have you had your fill of eggs?
Entries.Penny_spouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}'s trying to convince me to eat a deviled egg. I'm just not sure I can stomach it...
Entries.Sebastian: We used to do a rotten egg toss...#$b#Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} put an end to that pretty quick.
Entries.Caroline: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}}'s always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.
Entries.Jodi: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} loves this festival... it's a joy to see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} so happy.
Entries.Jas: I hope I can find some eggs before {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} takes them all...$s
